segments.text: Good morning , I am Monica . Are you Mr . White , the manager of finance department ? I am the newcomer and also working in the finance department .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that is me . Nice to meet you , Monica . Welcome on board !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I am very happy to have my own office now . I â€™ Ve never had one before . It is very nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we have nicer things than that in this company . You will find out soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I bet you will love them too . If you need help , just ask me any time . I am in the next door . You can also reach me through the extension 508 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is very kind of you . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
